select
from sys_user
1=1 AND user_name like CONCAT('%',(#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%') AND p_id = #{spId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND locked = #{locked,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND mobile like CONCAT('%',(#{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')

user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
